entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NOT AS COOL
MORE HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 50

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
